text:
THE UNIVERSITY OF NEBRASKA
LINCOLN 8, NEBRASKA
DEPARTMENT OF
SPEECH AND DRAMATIC ART
receives
22 Ssfttember'1961
Frank E. Schooley, Chairman .^C
NAEB Publications Committee
228 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
The breakfast meeting of the Publications Committee
at 8:00 a.m. on Monday morning, October 23rd (?) is
a good idea,
I plan to attend that meeting.
Howard S. Martin
Ass't. Prof, Radio-TV
103a Temple Bldg,
Univ. of Nebraska
